DataElement.preferredName: Document Version Workflow Status Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATE.FULL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date (and time) on which the status is assigned to the document version workflow.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Document Version Workflow Status Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of work.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time._An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of work.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.
A condition or state at a particular time.

Property.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened.

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS.DATE so that it must contain reference to a particular day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
